4.12 The OLE-AUTOMATION module

arg-spec-value

Function

Summary

arg-spec-value ref => value

Arguments

ref
An instance of <ole-arg-spec>.

Values

value
An instance of <object>.

Description

Accessor to return the value from an <ole-arg-spec> reference object created by the out-ref, inout-ref, or pass-as functions. May also be used on the left-hand side of an assignment to change the value.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
